---
title: a different view.
Author: Luis Cerezo
header:
  overlay_image: /assets/images/goat_mountain.jpg
  show_overlay_excerpt: false
---

Sometimes we all need a bit of perspective. I've been challenging myself to look at things differently.

None of these are taken from the perspective you'd see them in the real word.
